Headline: #29 StateTemporary Northbound Reroute near Illinois/Rush
ShortDescription: Northbound 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Ohio, Fairbanks and Illinois: due to,street blockage near Illinois/Rush.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound # 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Ohio, Fairbanks and Illinois: due to,street blockage near Illinois/Rush.

Southbound  buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Illinois/Rush
ShortDescription: Eastbound 65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Illinois, State, Ohio and Fairbanks: due to, street blockage near Illinois/Rush.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Illinois, State, Ohio and Fairbanks: due to, street blockage near Illinois/Rush.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #95 95th Temporary Reroute near 93rd/Dobson
ShortDescription: 95 95th buses temp. rerouted WB: via 95th between Woodlawn and Cottage ; EB via 95th between Cottage  and Woodlawn, due to, street blockage near 93rd/Dobson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 93rd/Dobson due to street blockage near 93rd/Dobson.

Westbound buses will operate via 95th between Woodlawn and Cottage Grove including the normal route streets..

Eastbound buses will operate via 95th between Cottage Grove and Woodlawn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #26 South Shore Express and #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Southbound Reroute near South Shore/79th
ShortDescription: 26 South Shore Express & 71 71st/South Shore buses are  rerouted via South Shore, 79th, Exchange, 83rd, & Commercial due to street blockage nr South Shore/79th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#26 South Shore Express & #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via South Shore, 79th, Exchange, 83rd, and Commercial due to street blockage near South Shore/79th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
